Articles.Content: Looks great, love the RCS, but it is hard to fly in the lower atmosphere. Likes to pitch up quite a bit.

I know exactly what you guys are talking about.

It\'s actually intended. Ausplane\'s main engine is only for orbital insertion and re-entry, like the Space Shuttle.

Stable flight is only possible when:

1. The main engine is switched off

2. The fuel tank is empty

I know exactly what you guys are talking about.

It\'s actually intended. Ausplane\'s main engine is only for orbital insertion and re-entry, like the Space Shuttle.

Stable flight is only possible when:

1. The main engine is switched off

2. The fuel tank is empty

tested and confirmed, no longer have the problem.
Awesome update Slew, the part description on the wings cracks me up man. Great work!

I know exactly what you guys are talking about.

It\'s actually intended. Ausplane\'s main engine is only for orbital insertion and re-entry, like the Space Shuttle.

Stable flight is only possible when:

1. The main engine is switched off

2. The fuel tank is empty

Makes a lot of sense. I like it.

I\'m just used to powered aircraft landings.

So... beautiful...

*Sniff*
Something strange happened to me... I landed the Ausplane upside down... and it increased speed and slid across the ground at 2000m/s.

Something strange happened to me... I landed the Ausplane upside down... and it increased speed and slid across the ground at 2000m/s.

something similar happened to me yesterday. I hit the ground and something exploded propelling me at 500m/s across the ground. Anyways the ausplane is gorgeous. I\'m making a video of an interstellar cruiser with the ausplane as the bridge/reentry stage. I\'m gonna finish it up today but it won\'t be released until next week.
Are you at some point going to give the Mei Long RCS?

Are you at some point going to give the Mei Long RCS?

I\'m thinking about it.
Found this on the YouTubes; describes exactly what I\'m talking aboot.
It seems you\'ve found the hidden mass driver cannon hidden underneath KSC.

Found this on the YouTubes; describes exactly what I\'m talking aboot.

this exactly! I think its safe to assume this is a very common glitch.

Vanguard has the same gliding problem. I don\'t think it\'s actually possible to fix without HarvesteR intervening.

As for the Hypersonic Acceleration Manifold, I have no idea.

Just used Ausplane.

Please view attached picture.

Found this on the YouTubes; describes exactly what I\'m talking aboot.

Just confirmed it here. Holy shit did I confirm it.

I actually crashed my game by landing upside down. So yeah, that happened.

I did some experiments and figured out the problem:

When the plane lands upside down, the RCS blocks hit first and explode.

The explosion throws the rest of the plane across the ground.

I\'ve confirmed that the same thing will happen to Nova\'s Vanguard if you attach some fragile components.

this exactly! I think its safe to assume this is a very common glitch.

Common? This is news to me.

Low earth Orbit Achieved 8)

T.M.I in 10 minutes.

Good Burn No residuals.

MidCourse correction act succesful.

Free return trajectory established.

M.O.I in 4 hours.

Starting Retro Burn.

Landing sequence initiated.

End result.

Too low too fast. >
how do you attach the ausplane like the way NASA did with the shuttle and how do you control the ausplane :-\

how do you attach the ausplane like the way NASA did with the shuttle and how do you control the ausplane :-\

RCS and magic/SAS although adding an SAS usually results in the craft splitting in half.

this exactly! I think its safe to assume this is a very common glitch.

I\'ve seen it happen with quite a few different ships. I think its pretty general and not necesarilly caused by the parts.

HD Texture Pack is now available.

It includes HD textures for both orange and black heatshields as well as five livery variants (also in orange and black).

Thanks to Luigibro606, RedDwarfIV, PD, Rico88 and Tomokatu for their designs.

Ausplane HD Textures (12.3MB)
